document_data.mainbody:
rmbras Delzord was a lamplighter inhabiting Waterdeep, City of Splendors, during the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
Ormbras was the guildmaster for the Guild of Chandlers and Lamplighters during the mid-to-late 14 century DR. He held the title of "Master of the Flame" within the guild and worked out of the House of Lightâ€“their headquarters in the Trades Ward.
